item.title: Gorillaz Announce New Album ‘The Mountain’ and European Tour
item.description: Gorillaz have announced a new album “The Mountain,” releasing March 20, 2026, as well as a European tour to coincide with the record. The group, created by Damon Albarn and Jamie Hewlett,
